text: The 2006–07 New Zealand V8 season (the leading motorsport category in New Zealand) consisted of seven rounds beginning on 3 November 2006 and ending 22 April 2007. The defending champion was Kayne Scott, although it would be John McIntyre who would win his first New Zealand V8 Touring Car championship. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- ! colspan=2 | Round !
